column3:
Zukin is clamoring for giant clams.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Obtain slick debris from giant clams.
Deliver the slick debris to Zukin.

<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, you are familiar with giant clams, yes? They have an appetite to match their prodigious size, and are known to indiscriminately devour random objects that drift by.
I would be grateful if you could seek out these clams, prise them open, and bring back the slick debris you find inside. Four such pieces should suffice.
Ah, there you are, and with your arms intact. Just as well─we may still have need of them. But come, let us see what the clams have rendered up.
Yes, these are precisely what I sought! You have done well, my friend.

When a foreign object settles inside a shell, it gradually develops a hard and lustrous coating. While such articles are not as valuable as a well-formed pearl, they are not without worth. Nor is it unheard of for clams to be holding treasures!
